attributes.action: Reduce exam content for A-Level exams for students examinations in 2021
attributes.additional_details: Due to the current circumstances, Covid-19, students have missed a substantial amount of learning (6 months online learning where certain students had difficulty accessing online materials resulting in them not learning efficiently) consequently, it has given certain students an advantage over others. Furthermore, the pressure of doing exams and learning all the content in time for these exams has been very damaging to the mental health of these students. cutting the content would be beneficial.
attributes.background: Reduce subject content across all A-Levels

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
